mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO, STU_YR, STU_NM, STU_TEL FROM STUDENT

SELECT S.STU_NO , S.DEP_CD , S.STU_YR , S.STU_SEM , S.STU_NM , S.STU_NME , S.STU_TEL , S.STU_ADDR1 , S.STU_ADDR2 , SUBSTR(S.STU_REG,1,6) AS STU_REG , D.DEP_NM , S.STU_PIC FROM STUDENT S, DEPARTMENT D WHERE S.STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD
